entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 30 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 4.
